{"step_by_step_thinking": "Penicillinase-resistant penicillins are specifically designed to resist degradation by the penicillinase enzyme. From the provided documents, it is mentioned that penicillinase-resistant penicillins include methicillin, nafcillin, oxacillin, cloxacillin, dicloxacillin, and flucloxacillin. Among the given choices, the penicillinase-resistant penicillin is Cloxacillin (option B).", "answer_choice": "B"}
